description: Stevenage striker Jamie Reid signs an "improved and extended" contract with the League One club.
title: Jamie Reid: Stevenage striker extends contract with League One club
title_page: Jamie Reid: Stevenage striker extends contract with League One club - BBC Sport
maintext:
Stevenage striker Jamie Reid has agreed an "improved and extended" contract with the League One club.
The 30-year-old scored nine goals in 49 appearances this season as Boro finished 14th in the table under boss Alex Revell.
He first joined the club from Mansfield Town in the summer of 2021 following spells at Exeter City and Torquay United.
Reid has 55 goals in 197 games for Stevenage and is seventh on their all-time scorers' list.
